attributes.action: Derbyshire council to rectify dangerous potholes in Dronfield town
attributes.additional_details: I think that we should all be subsidised in our council tax and car tax and we should stand together and object to pay what is demanded of us until Derbyshire council sort all these dangerous potholes out in dronfield town. They have a duty of care to rectify these dangerous pot holes, before some pedestrian or motorists get injured.
